```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights13)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(cache = TRUE)
```


## Airports accessed

```{r filter-joins-1}
airports %>%
  semi_join(flights, by = c("faa" = "dest"))
```

## Airports not flown to

```{r filter-joins-2}
airports %>%
  anti_join(flights, by = c("faa" = "dest"))
```
